oai_dc:dc.dc:description: When he sneezes, ||kabbo believes his family is talking about him and about the |xam, their names, their masters, their families and their search for their wives. 1) p.634v: a cut-out clipping on traditions relating to sneezing in various cultures, 2) p.645v: relations and their names; Albert Meintjes is a Bastard; the colours of skins of different peoples, 3) p.646v: Dutch names of |xam, 4) 648v: names and skin colours of |xam women, 5) p.651v: ||kabbo's's wife's name, 6) This story is found in Book II-6.
